twoSetSkill.name: Recommendation 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Boosts total DMG by 30.0%. Censured State lasts 4s longer.

threeSetSkill.name: Reclusive Guide 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Ultimate activation boosts Total DMG dealt by the host and the teammate on field by 20.0% for 18s (effect cannot stack). When equipped by Starlit Astrologos, she additionally gains 40.0% Crit DMG.
